1.0.name: wordpress/zeenoble
1.0.description: zeeNoble is a fully responsive WordPress theme that looks wonderful on any device. Theme Features include a frontpage template that supports widgets and also has a big content slideshow to attract visitors. Theme options let you choose from eight different color schemes, left or right sidebar layout and upload your own logo image. Of course there is support of all WordPress core features like custom menus, widgetized sidebars, custom background, custom headers and featured images. Check out a full demo on http://preview.themezee.com/zeenoble/
